name: Block Go - Puzzle Game
description:
Block Go - The goal of the Block Game is very simple. Sliding the block horizontally to fill and clear the whole line. Block Go is completely free and easy to play.

  Block Go mesmerize you from the beginning, and you will have a fascinating Block Go play experience you have never had before.  

Finish the block puzzle as many times as you can, and you'll be pleasantly surprised rewards!  

Why Block Go is better:
 - It is free to play, and there are even more fun
 - Suitable for any age stage of the Block Go, Exercise your brain's logic
 - The Block Go interface is excellent, the original painting is lovely, and the dynamic effect is cool  

Block Go is a fun and easy game to play. Go and Enjoy it now!
